Reviews.Content: arrived hotel morning flight told wait till 2 pm frustrating reception staff speaks english offer little help checkin past reception attracted hotel’s elegance lobby doorways heavy red curtains chandeliers furniture castle interiors heritage styling explains version tv bed slight disappointment bathroom invites adverse comments internet lan connection available chargeable basis breakfast spread little warm stuff offer repetitive usp hotel location main happening street rome stone’s throwaway distance termini station republica main destinations colloseum capitol hill fountain trevi spanish steps walkable distances vatican reached metro metro exit steps hidden treasure hotel beautiful garden rear conference overall recommended despite availability options mainly due charm elegance goes feeling roma

Reviews.Title: “Loved the Quirinale, stay here!!!!”
Reviews.Author: lolly1603
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights definitely recommend location perfect walking main tourist attractions 50 metres metro republica stop hotel beautiful garden located rear hotel lovely feature arrived noon told wasnt ready til 2pm irritating sampled local tipple waiting bedroom ceilings chandelier pictured website bathroom huge stocked toiletries restocked day hotel staff helpful overfriendly hotel noisy times traffic etc didnt bother breakfast usual hot cold fayre fantastic satisfied trekking streets rome day overall definitely reccommend hotel price comparison link website deal cheaper sites worry sleeping broom cupboard stay worried stay
